Subject: Upgrade to NEA v12.0
Description: Upgrade from NEA v11.6 to v12.0
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c: 5-May 10:38AM EST: issue is in active review Dev on duty
What_We_Know__c: Issue was caused by a Jobs archive being unzipped in the Jobs directory
Next_Steps__c: Sounds like the issues we were seeing in 11.6 of scheduled tasks not kicking off (specifically bulk imports post-scans) have resolved but are waiting on another round of scans to verify.
Solution_Comment__c:
We upgraded the following :
* Netwrix Enterprise Auditor from version 11.6.0.130 to 12.0.1070
* 7x FSAA Proxy Servers from v11.6.0.37 to 12.0.0.1048
* Access Information Center from v11.6.0.32 to 12.0.0.48

Post-upgrade of the NEA Console and we're having some issues with the scheduled tasks where an archived jobs folder unzipped itself in the job directory. We removed that and re-imported Scheduled Tasks into the Windows Task Scheduler without issue. Post-fix, 0-CreateSchema was run and the Published Reports web service was set to use the NEA Service Account.
